EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_DenverOfficeOpeningQ215.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend the Pivotal Denver Grand Office Opening (June 11)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for Pivotal Denver Grand Office Opening. See event details below.
Date: Thursday, June 11, 2015 Time: 5pm - 8pm Location: Pivotal Office <https://www.google.ca/maps/place/1644+Platte+St,+Denver,+CO+80202,+USA/@39.7578395,-105.0070954,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x876c78eae6b4fa5d:0x9d7b7c5f936b1ef5>, 1644 Platte St, Suite 200, Denver, CO, 80202
Should you have any questions or would like more information, please email info@pivotal.io <mailto:info@pivotal.io>. See you on Thursday, June 11th!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
